entry.name: rotation
entry.label: Software rotation of the graphics. Allowed values are NORMAL: 0 degrees (default) CW: Clockwise 90 degrees CCW: CounterClockWise 90 degrees UD: upside down 180 degrees

entry.name: fakeBrightness
entry.label: On devices that don't support hardware screen brightness this just dims the QML scene in software.

entry.name: showMuteButton
